component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands:
Configure R2 with the following:
  • Create tunnel interface 0
  • Set the tunnel mode to GRE using IP as the delivery protocol
  • Assign the IP address 192.168.2.2/24
  • Set the tunnel source as 209.165.201.2
  • Set the tunnel destination as 209.165.201.1
  • Configure OSPF using process ID 1
  • Advertise the 192.168.2.0/24 network for area 0

command.instruction:
Configure R1 with the following:
  • Create tunnel interface 0
  • Set the tunnel mode to GRE using IP as the delivery protocol
  • Assign the IP address 192.168.2.1/24
  • Set the tunnel source as 209.165.201.1
  • Set the tunnel destination as 209.165.201.2
  • Configure OSPF using process ID 1
  • Advertise the 192.168.2.0/24 network for area 0
Return directly to privileged EXEC mode. Display the brief interface listing filtered to include the word 'Tunnel'.

command.correctresponse: show ip interface brief | include Tunnel

command.deviceresponse:

Tunnel receive bandwidth 8000 (kbps)
